scripts.localConvert4Project: rm -rf ./test/servers/ ./test/file-servers/ &&  npm run build && cd ./test && node ./test.js && cd .. && rm -rf /Users/fd/wj/psp-web-pro/src/services/wj && mv ./test/servers/api/  /Users/fd/wj/psp-web-pro/src/services/wj
scripts.test:linux: rm -rf ./test/servers/ ./test/file-servers/ &&  npm run build && cd ./test && node ./test.js && cd ..
scripts.test: pnpm run build && rimraf ./test/servers/ ./test/file-servers/ &&  ts-node ./test/test.ts --project tsconfig.json && cd ..
